snippet.title: Seasonal Blooms: Goofy Festivals
snippet.description: It must be the budding trees or flowering bulbs that make people giddy, but springtime is the time for strange celebrations and goofy festivals. Communities get weird as early as February, trying to throw off winter's s...

snippet.title: Here He Comes ... 'Speed Racer' Cartoon Series
Anchorage Market & Festival
snippet.description: Every summer weekend, more than 300 vendors pitch tents and tables at the Anchorage Market and Festival. It's a perfect place to shop for last-minute souvenirs, chat with the locals, and admire handcrafted art from the ...

snippet.description: At Epcot's annual Flower and Garden Festival, magic is always in bloom.
